item.description:
This is being hosted by The What is He/She Thinking and Single Parents Groups as well. There will be a small event fee of $3 associated with this.

From
Listen up! Due to the great response for the "Be My Valentine, dammit" event, I've had to change to a bigger venue per The "What is He/She Thinking?" Group, Union Street Restaurant

Not only will we have plenty of room to mix and mingle, we'll also be welcoming members of the The "What is He/She Thinking?" Group , The Boston/Providence Single Parents Meetup Group and possibly a third group.

Parking: Plenty of street parking all over Newton Centre.

Driving Directions To Union Street Restaurant
item.how_to_find_us: "Ask the host(ess) for the big meet up group. We will be upstairs. When you walk into the restaurant look to the left. Take those stairs up to the second floor."
item.why: Be you singles or in an LTR come on out for some laughs on Thirsty Thursday with a twist. ***Singles: Who knows you just might meet that perfect someone here!
item.name: Be My Valentine, dammit w/ The "What is He/She Thinking?" Group
